A short way down the western road which connects Elis to the far-off Shinrin Highlands, a large, natural clearing in the woods has been expanded, reshaped, and levelled into a huge, flat rectangle. Surrounding this space, a perimeter ditch has been dug, and as an extra layer of protection, the trees which were chopped down to expand the clearing have been used to construct a chest-high wall. The creators of this fortification, and the people who are now occupying the hundreds of tents that have been set up inside it, are the Amazon refugees from Themiscyra.

Posted at each of the entrances to this fortified camp, a pair of Amazon warriors are standing guard. As you approach, they cross their dories in a clear sign that your entry is forbidden. Clearly having mistaken you for a stranger, these guards will surely lower their guard and grant you entry to their camp if you were to tell them who you are...
